ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(ISBLANK(HRCSVC_Quoted_Part__c)) && NOT(ISNEW()) && (ISCHANGED(HRCSVC_Quoted_Part__c) || ISCHANGED(QuantityConsumed) || ISCHANGED(UnitPrice) || ISCHANGED(HRCSVC_Discount_Percent__c) || ISCHANGED(HRCSVC_Coverage_Override__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the Unit Price or Quantity of a Quoted Part. You must delete this record, re-quote it, and then re-consume the Quoted Part to obtain a new price.
